nl.geodienstencentrum.maven.plugin.sass.report

Class SCSSLintReportMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.apache.maven.reporting.AbstractMavenReport
        • nl.geodienstencentrum.maven.plugin.sass.report.SCSSLintReportMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo, MavenMultiPageReport, MavenReport

    @Mojo(name="scss-lint-report",
      defaultPhase=SITE,
      threadSafe=true)
@Execute(goal="scss-lint",
         phase=COMPILE)
public class SCSSLintReportMojo
extends AbstractMavenReport
    SCSSLintMojo executes scss-lint-report goal.
    Since:
    2.3
    Author:
    mprins
